# 1. Use official Tomcat server as a base
FROM tomcat:9.0

# 2. Remove default apps from Tomcat (we only want your project)
RUN rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/*

# 3. Copy your WAR file into Tomcat's webapps folder
COPY target/hospital9117.war /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/ROOT.war

# 4. Expose port 8080 (the port Tomcat uses)
EXPOSE 8080

# 5. Run Tomcat
CMD ["catalina.sh", "run"]
